description: So this project is for tracking the courier from internal and scan the internal product for delivery. In here he using kotlin for develop this application

So this project is for e commerce in ayugold. In this project, he assisted to create a custom after-quote feature, BPMN flow, and check errors in the forgot password process. This project developed using the Magento 2 framework.

So this project is for e commerce in sinarmasapp. In this project, He contributed by exporting files in .xml format, developing GraphQL queries to retrieve data such as production dates, product reviews and ratings, form label data, and specification form data. The project was built using the Magento 2 framework.
